title: Raymond 750-R45TT 4500Lb Capacity Standing Forklift with Charger
item_description:
Raymond 750-R45TT 4500Lb Capacity Standing Forklift with Charger

Note: Forklift has been reserved by Auctioneer and will be available for pickup by appointment only on Monday, December 23rd, 2024 from 3:00 pm - 3:30 pm. This unit will be used during the removal period, therefore the hours below are an approximate guideline.
  • Manufacturer: Raymond
  • Model: 750-R45TT
  • Load Capacity: 4,500 Lbs
  • Fuel Type: Electric
  • Mast Type: Single
  • Hour Meter Reads: 10,497
  • Serial Number: 750-14-AC41171
  • Overall Width: 42”
  • Overall Length: 98”
  • Overall Height: 118”
  • Truck Weight: 8,570 Lbs
  • Tire Type: Solid Rubber
  • Number of Front Tires: 4
  • Number of Rear Tires: 2
  • Maximum Lift Height: 250”
  • Fork Length: 42”
  • Transmission: Automatic
  • Condition: Used
  • Starts: Yes
  • Charger Included

Removal Note: this lot is to be picked up last day of removal.
